infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos of shops.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to mark shop locations on the map.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select shop photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Kenix Sales Agent to use your location to mark shop locations.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Kenix Sales Agent to access your camera to take shop photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Kenix Sales Agent to access your photos to select shop images.
